title: Peter Milne (boat designer)
text:
Peter Antony Milne (20 September 1934 – 23 May 2008) was a British boat designer. He designed more than forty craft, including the <a href="Fireball%20%28dinghy%29">Fireball</a> and <a href="Javelin%20dinghy%20%28Europe%29">Javelin</a> dinghies.
Milne was born in <a href="Stockport%2C%20Cheshire">Stockport, Cheshire</a> and was educated at <a href="St%20John%27s%20College%2C%20Hurstpierpoint">St John's College, Hurstpierpoint</a>. He also served as editor of "<a href="Classic%20Boat">Classic Boat</a>" magazine.
